Text: February Buyback Dealsin case you want to have around Forwarded by Kenneth SeamanHOUECT on AM Kenneth Seaman AM To Julie CT Robert E CT cc Subject February Buyback Deals Attached is my list for Feb Please let me know if you see anything out of the ordinary Ken

February Issues Cc currently going over the February setup in UNIFY to locate current and potential problems for the month If you like I would be glad to get together tomorrow afternoon and review the problems just to give you an overview on what I see Let me know Ken

Re Scheduleguess he wont be by as he knows it all now And if he doesnt it will be my fault for not teaching him correctly Supplemental to our conversation yesterday I would come back to help you with a project or job for which you needed any of my talents If it involves working with this guy FORGET IT PS I have not taught him well as things are still being done incorrectly Ken Forwarded by Kenneth SeamanHOUECT on AM From Robert E Lloyd on AM To Kenneth CT cc Subject Re Schedule I simple want you to know personally that I appreciate the time spent with you Ken you have taught me well I have the confidence to carry the torch and thanks again for being available Kenneth Seaman AM To Robert E CT cc Subject Schedule The day you have long awaited is arriving I will be in the office next Monday and Tuesday the th and th If you have any questions or situations you would like some help with that will be your last chance I will then leave you in peace

Re LyondellCitgoknow I dont think Robert would get on the same page with me if his life depended on it Forwarded by Kenneth SeamanHOUECT on AM From Robert E Lloyd on PM To Kenneth CT cc Subject Re LyondellCitgo Thanks Ken however the term deal agreed to by Lyondell via nomination is only for Lyondell also nominated a base deal Kenneth Seaman PM To Robert E CT cc Subject LyondellCitgo Sitara is tiered pricing If you want you can nom whatever volume is on the deal ticket and the economics will work out correctly It will keep things in balance a bit better but you can go either way For Feb there is a base deal for day and a term deal for day Only of the is pathed

LyondellCitgo is tiered pricing If you want you can nom whatever volume is on the deal ticket and the economics will work out correctly It will keep things in balance a bit better but you can go either way For Feb there is a base deal for day and a term deal for day Only of the is pathed

Mobil February ActivityI detect a shot here chuckle Forwarded by Kenneth SeamanHOUECT on AM From Robert E Lloyd AM To Kenneth CT cc George CT Pat NRON Subject Mobil February Activity FYIOnly I changed a path you created for meter for d to an incorrect contract k

Followupfollowing up to my week ago note Rest assured I know how hectic things have been around here and how many irons you have in your fire Time for my issues are Im sure a lower priority Let me offer a thought or two I dont have enough challenges at the moment to hold my interest I had asked for next Wed and Thurs off Lets toss in Fri also My expectation is you would have a plan by the time I would come back Monday the th I hate to be a pest but you need to get a better value for the paltry salary s you are paying me Maybe a TuesThurs week would work better for each of us Or if things are going the way they seem to be you dont need me at all If you could possibly let me know before the th what the plan is I sure would appreciate it Thanks Ken PS Just in case the plug is pulled on this please no formal goodbys I will pay my respects to those I want too I would very much like to just fadeout ok

Re Valero Meter it looks like we are going with the no deal situation I will zero out the buyback and the sale for the next weeks Let me know if you want to handle it differently Forwarded by Kenneth SeamanHOUECT on PM Enron North America Corp From Gary W Lamphier AM To Kenneth CT cc Dan J CT Joanie H CT Subject Re Valero Meter I have requested a force majeure letter from Valero and they wanted to know what exact language should be in this letter Dan can you give me some guidance that I can directly forward to Valero Kenneth Seaman AM To Gary W CT cc Daren J CT Joanie H CT Subject Valero Meter The plant went down at hrs this morning My information is they moved their turnaround up and will be down for as long as weeks Please let us know how the economics should be handled buyback force majure no deal or what Thanks Ken

Valero Meter Cc went down at hrs this morning My information is they moved their turnaround up and will be down for as long as weeks Please let us know how the economics should be handled buyback force majure no deal or what Thanks Ken

Industrial Accounts Cc leave Robert to the above accounts I will refer all contacts on this subject to him for handling It is my personal belief that Robert is not yet ready to provide all the services necessary in this area but I also know that full responsibility often is a good teacher Pat as far as Im concerned Im out of the game I will help Daren if needed and if not Ill be on my way GOOD LUCK to you in your endeavors

Industrial Accountswould not have had a clue how to do Valero but he seems to think so I give No mas Lets finish this stuff up and call it a day Forwarded by Kenneth SeamanHOUECT on PM From Robert E Lloyd PM To Gary W CT Lee L CT cc Pat NRON Daren J CT Kenneth CT Subject Industrial Accounts As of January I have taken over scheduling all Industrial Accounts without the assistance of Kenneth Seaman I want to thank Ken for all of his efforts during our training period Ken has help me feel confident to continue this responsibility with little if any assistance from himself Thus please forward all correspondence to me directly in the future

Valero Cc is now to be treated seperately Tickets have been created accordingly Meter Base Swing Buyback Meter Base Swing Buyback Meter Base Swing Buyback Volume Management will need to set up accounting arrangements to cover November and December Scheduling will repath and renom Unify and reallocate POPS for January If anyone has anything to add to this please let me know Ken

Lyondell gas looks like it is not allocating correctly in Jan I have not researched as to why but if you like I can come down and go over some things to help identify and correct these kinds of problems Let me know Ken

Re Industrialsleave this with you My take is that the situation is as I suspected and Pat wants me to pretty much leave them be I will do that unless I hear a different plan from you Forwarded by Kenneth SeamanHOUECT on AM Pat NRON AM To Kenneth CT cc Robert E CT Subject Re Industrials Ken I think Robert has a good handle on things and can function on his own With that said we always want different checks and balances in place in order to capture the most accurate information so if you see something that is a problem please bring it to our attention Thanks Pat Kenneth Seaman ECT AM To Pat NRON cc Subject Re Industrials I believe the transition to be complete as we have at least been over the ground on all the subjects Would you like me to continue offering advise and assistance or let Robert function entirely on his own

Industrials Forwarded by Kenneth SeamanHOUECT on PM Pat NRON PM To Kenneth CT Robert E CT cc Subject Industrials Ken and Robert The industrials should be completely transitioned to Robert as of January Please let me know if this is not complete and what else is left to transition Thanks Pat
Buyback Deals January Cc the current buyback deals Im aware of If you have further information please let me know Thanks Ken

January Setup MOPSmeter has several deals set up and of them are ranked These will not allocate properly as you know Suggest you double check all the Industrials to ensure they are ranked correctly January will then need to be renomed Ken

Re Meter one resolved this It still needs to be done You Robert and Volume management need to be involved for November You and Robert can take care of Dec If you need more input let me know Thanks Ken Kimberly Vaughn PM To Kenneth CT cc Subject Re Meter I was on vacation the week that sent this note out I was just wondering if anyone helped you resolve this And if not do you need help Forwarded by Kimberly VaughnHOUECT on PM Kenneth Seaman PM To Kimberly CT cc Subject Re Meter I think I know what you are asking but not for sure What does do this while I was out mean Kimberly Vaughn PM To Kenneth CT cc Subject Meter Ken Did anyone do this while I was out Do you need anthing Forwarded by Kimberly VaughnHOUECT on PM Kenneth Seaman PM To Howard B CT Kimberly CT Robert E CT cc Subject Meter In November volume was applied to deal when in fact all volume should be on Please effect this change asap and insure December is set up for Deal should have been terminated at the end of October Thanks Ken

Valero and Cc my understanding the outages Valero incurred at the above locations are force majure situations during December and should not trigger the buyback feature of the contract Gary I have not seen any documentation of this from Valero Please follow up with your counterpart to secure the letter of notice or we will need to process the deal as if the buyback is active Thanks Ken

Re Meter Oct Beaumont Methanol Cc did we discuss BMC Lee can confirm the accuracy of this but BMC bought from us and intended no swing and no buyback Brandywine Dorcheus controlled the meter therefore it is their responsibility to make up the overs and unders I believe a deal is in place with Brandywine to cover that very issue for November If not please let me know Lee if this is not your understanding for Nov business please let us all know Thanks Ken Howard B Camp PM To Lee L CT cc Thu CT Kenneth CT Howard B CT Kristen J CT Stella L CT Julie CT Subject Re Meter Oct Beaumont Methanol Lee I need you to answer a few questions to resolve this issue First you show a deal volume of on Nov and the pipeline confirmed this volume Is this the volume you agreed to sell Beaumont Methanol This volume is in agreement what the deal ticket says the volume confirmed by HPL and Dorcheuss volume Second the buyback issue is that a buyback is set up until June per Julie Meyers notes she sends out every month Last note sent Dec and you are on distribution list Brandywine has nothing to do with this issue It is an issue between HPL and Beaumont Methanol Do we have an active buyback in place and how do you decide to use the buyback This is a commercial issue that I need further clarification from you if you have a buyback in place or not If not please notify Julie and note on the deal ticket that this buyback is no longer effective If it is still active please contact Chyral and resolve Let me know the final resolution HC Forwarded by Howard B CampHOUECT on PM From Thu Nguyen PM To Howard B CT cc Subject Re Meter Oct Beaumont Methanol Forwarded by Thu NguyenHOUECT on PM From Lee L Papayoti on PM To Thu CT cc Stella L CT Kristen J CT Subject Re Meter Oct Beaumont Methanol I dont have all the data that you have in front of you and so am not in a position to call Bob Dorcheus please call him directly at this is an issue between Brandywine and Beaumont Methanol please reference the fax from Chyral Hankins of Beaumont Methanol when you call Bob Dorcheus Also Chryal tells me there is a problem on November and our invoice shows us buying gas back from Beaumont Methanol on those three days something that was a surprise to her Again this an allocation issue between Beaumont Methanol and Brandywine please call Chyral at before calling Bob Dorcheus Thanks From Thu Nguyen PM To Lee L CT cc Stella L CT Kristen J CT Subject Meter Oct Beaumont Methanol Lee Stella tells me she does have a nom of on day Could you please get back with Dorcheus and find out why there is a discrecpancy in the noms Thanks Thu Forwarded by Thu NguyenHOUECT on PM From Thu Nguyen AM To Stella L CT cc Lee L CT Subject Meter Oct Beaumont Methanol Stella Could you please verify your confirmations for Beaumont Methanol for Oct prod There is a discrepancy on day where we have confirmed nom of and they show zero I will send you a fax copy from Chyral Hankins Please let me know Thanks Thu

Re Lyondell citgo Cc understanding is the buyback will be in place through A new deal for day begins and currently has no buyback provision Ken Howard B Camp PM To Gary W CT cc Kenneth CT Kristen J CT Tina CT Howard B CT Subject Lyondell citgo Gary I have been notified that there is a possibility that the buyback was not effective for Lyondell Citgo Could you please inform me via CC mail what the status of the buyback is once you have reviewed it HC

January Setup MOPSmeter has several deals set up and of them are ranked These will not allocate properly as you know Suggest you double check all the Industrials to ensure they are ranked correctly January will then need to be renomed Ken
Buyback Deals January Cc the current buyback deals Im aware of If you have further information please let me know Thanks Ken

Industrials Forwarded by Kenneth SeamanHOUECT on PM Pat NRON PM To Kenneth CT Robert E CT cc Subject Industrials Ken and Robert The industrials should be completely transitioned to Robert as of January Please let me know if this is not complete and what else is left to transition Thanks Pat

Followupfollowing up to my week ago note Rest assured I know how hectic things have been around here and how many irons you have in your fire Time for my issues are Im sure a lower priority Let me offer a thought or two I dont have enough challenges at the moment to hold my interest I had asked for next Wed and Thurs off Lets toss in Fri also My expectation is you would have a plan by the time I would come back Monday the th I hate to be a pest but you need to get a better value for the paltry salary s you are paying me Maybe a TuesThurs week would work better for each of us Or if things are going the way they seem to be you dont need me at all If you could possibly let me know before the th what the plan is I sure would appreciate it Thanks Ken PS Just in case the plug is pulled on this please no formal goodbys I will pay my respects to those I want too I would very much like to just fadeout ok
